=Align DS610 Servo=
  * 333Hz Refresh Rate and 1520µs Neutral Pulse 
  * 0.10Second/60Degree, 9.6Kg.cm Torque @ 4.8V
  * 0.08Second/60Degree, 12.0Kg.cm Torque @ 6V

=Align DS650 Servo=
  * 333Hz Refresh Rate and 1520µs Neutral Pulse
  * 0.06Second/60Degree, 4.0Kg.cm Torque @ 4.8V
  * 0.05Second/60Degree, 5.0Kg.cm Torque @ 6V
